solution_line_template: Roberto skips {roberto_minute_skips} times per minute because {roberto_hourly_skips} / {minutes_per_hour} = <<{roberto_hourly_skips}/{minutes_per_hour}={roberto_minute_skips}>>{roberto_minute_skips}.
Together they skip {total_minute_skips} times a minute.
They will skip {total_skips} times because {total_minute_skips} x {total_minutes} = <<{total_minute_skips}*{total_minutes}={total_skips}>>{total_skips}
